KScriptSetting.Name: Security
KScriptSetting.Description: Private MD5 and SHA1 encryption and a simple two way encrypt and decrypt function
KScriptSetting.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
    
    var input = "myvalue"; 
    var key = "hashkey"; 
    
    var md5value = k.security.md5(input); 
 
    var sha = k.security.sha1(input); 
  
    var encrptyValue = k.security.encrypt(input, key); 
    
    var decryptValue =k.security.decrypt(encrptyValue, key);  
      
</script>

Method.Name: md5
Method.Description: Compute a 32 length text string value
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
     var input = "myvalue";  
    var md5value = k.security.md5(input);  
</script>

Param.Name: Input
Param.Description: The original value to compute MD5 value

Method.Name: sha1
Method.Description: Compute a 40 length text string value
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
     var input = "myvalue";  
     var shavalue = k.security.sha1(input); 
</script>

Param.Name: Input
Param.Description: The original value to compute SHA1 value

Method.Name: encrypt
Method.Description: Encrypt a string based on the key.
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
     var input = "myvalue"; 
     var key = "hashkey";  
     var encrptyValue = k.security.encrypt(input, key);  
    var decryptValue =k.security.decrypt(encrptyValue, key);  
</script>

Param.Name: Input
Param.Description: The original value to compute encrypted value

Param.Name: key
Param.Description: The key that can be used to encrypt and decrpte value.

Method.Name: decrypt
Method.Description: Encrypt a string based on the key.
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript"> 
     var input = "myvalue"; 
     var key = "hashkey";  
     var encrptyValue = k.security.encrypt(input, key);   
     var decryptValue =k.security.decrypt(encrptyValue, key);   
</script>

Param.Name: key
Param.Description: The key that can be used to encrypt and decrpte value.
